data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Napoli.
In the minute 1, Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Naples.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Victor Osimhen (Napoli) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio San Paolo.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Napoli have a goal kick.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Napoli have got their heads in front thanks to a Hirving Lozano strike.
In the minute 10, Dries Mertens instrumental with a fine assist.
Victor Osimhen of Napoli gets in a strike, but is off target.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
Genoa's Davide Zappacosta gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 17, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Napoli.
Hirving Lozano for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Genoa.
The match at Stadio San Paolo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lorenzo Insigne, who is down injured.
In the minute 22, Free kick Genoa.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Genoa throw-in in Napoli's half.
Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) has taken off Lorenzo Insigne who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Eljif Elmas is the replacement.
In the minute 24, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a throw-in for Genoa, close to Napoli's area.
Genoa have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Napoli just outside Genoa's area.
In the minute 29, Napoli surge into the attack at Stadio San Paolo but Victor Osimhen’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 34, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Can Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Genoa are coming forward and Davide Zappacosta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
Genoa drive upfield and Miha Zajc gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Napoli defender.
In the minute 41, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Napoli to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli's Victor Osimhen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In Naples, Davide Zappacosta of Genoa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Genoa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Napoli.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Stadio San Paolo.
Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a second substitution, with Nikola Maksimovic replacing Kostas Manolas.
In the minute 46, Goal! Piotr Zielinski extends Napoli's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Victor Osimhen to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Free kick in a good position for Napoli!
In Naples Napoli attack through Fabian Ruiz. The finish is off target, however.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Genoa a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Genoa.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Eljif Elmas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Hirving Lozano for Napoli drives towards goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo's header is off-target for Napoli.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio San Paolo.
Rolando Maran is making the team's first substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Paolo Ghiglione replacing Luca Pellegrini.
The away team have replaced Miha Zajc with Goran Pandev. This is the second substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Genoa.
Throw-in Genoa.
Dries Mertens puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Piotr Zielinski.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
Genoa's Milan Badelj breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team replace Milan Badelj with Valon Behrami.
In the minute 65, Goal! Hirving Lozano extends Napoli's lead to 4-0.
Dries Mertens with an assist there.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
Matteo Politano is replacing Hirving Lozano for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Dries Mertens with Stanislav Lobotka. This is the fourth substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio San Paolo.
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Genoa drive forward but Goran Pandev is judged offside.
In the minute 69, Goal! Napoli extend their lead to 5-0 through Eljif Elmas.
Elseid Hysaj with an assist there.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Napoli throw-in in Genoa's half.
In the minute 72, Napoli take a comfortable 6-0 lead thanks to Matteo Politano.
Giovanni Di Lorenzo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 73, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Faouzi Ghoulam is replacing Piotr Zielinski for the home team.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Attention is being given to Napoli’s Fabian Ruiz and play has been suspended briefly.
Napoli’s Fabian Ruiz is on his feet again at Stadio San Paolo.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Napoli's Fabian Ruiz is on target but unsuccessful.
Genoa to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Napoli in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Play has been interrupted briefly in Naples to check on Davide Biraschi, who is grimacing with pain.
Davide Biraschi for Genoa is back on the field again.
Genoa advance rapidly upfield but Juan Luca Sacchi blows for offside.
In the minute 89, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Napoli's Faouzi Ghoulam gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Full-time! The final score is 6-0.
Mattia Destro (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Andrea Masiello (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Juan Luca Sacchi.
Victor Osimhen (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
